Command Line Tools¶

The File Processor provides the following command-line options:

-f, --file FILE

Path to the input text file (required)

-wc, --word-count

Display the total word count

-cc, --char-count

Display the total character count

-find WORD Search for a specific word in the text file -r, –replace OLD NEW Replace a word in the text file with another word

For detailed usage of each option, see the User Guide section.
